product_name: Aloe Gator Cherry Lip Balm - 30 SPF
long_description: Aloe Gator Cherry SPF 30 lip balm provides good sun protection while aloe helps soothe chapped or sunburned lips. Nongreasy antioxidant formula includes aloe extract for its moisturizing properties. PABA-free formula glides on easily and lasts, even during high-activity sports. Apply liberally before sun exposure and reapply as needed. Includes an accessory carabiner.
short_description: Aloe Gator Cherry SPF 30 lip balm provides good sun protection while aloe helps soothe chapped or sunburned lips.
